competency.title: Title
competency.optionalDescription: Optional competencies are not required to complete the learning path. They can provide additional practice or may cover material that exceeds the courses requirements.
competency.progressDescription: The progress is influenced by the percentage of completed lecture units and your score in the exercises.
competency.masteryDescription: A weighted metric of your progress, which shows your overall advancement towards competency mastery.

confidenceReasons.NO_REASON: The confidence is roughly the same as the mastery
confidenceReasons.RECENT_SCORES_LOWER: Since your recent scores are lower than your average in the competency, the mastery is lower than the progress
confidenceReasons.RECENT_SCORES_HIGHER: Since your recent scores are higher than your average in the competency, the mastery is higher than the progress
confidenceReasons.MORE_EASY_POINTS: Since you mostly scored your points in easy exercises, the mastery is lower than the progress
confidenceReasons.MORE_HARD_POINTS: Since you mostly scored your points in hard exercises, the mastery is higher than the progress
confidenceReasons.QUICKLY_SOLVED_EXERCISES: Since you solved some exercises quickly, the mastery is higher than the progress

manage.title: Competency Management
manage.importAllButton: Import all competencies of a course
manage.empty: No competencies exist for this course
manage.deleteRelationModalText: Are you sure you want to delete the relation between "{{titleTail}}" and "{{titleHead}}"?

import.title: Import Competencies
import.searchTableEmpty: Found no competencies matching your search

generate.title: Generate Competency Recommendations
generate.deleteModalText: Are you sure you want to delete "{{title}}"?
generate.saveModalText: You have not viewed all recommendations, do you still want to continue?
generate.errorWarning: You may not save because some competencies are invalid

courseDescription.title: Enter a Course Description
courseDescription.requiredValidationError: Course description must not be empty
courseDescription.minlengthValidationError: Course description must be at least {{min}} characters long
courseDescription.maxlengthValidationError: Course description is limited to {{max}} characters
courseDescription.infoTooltip: Enter a course description, focusing on the theoretical/practical content and learning objectives. Iris will then use it to generate recommendations for competencies you could add to your course.
courseDescription.warning: No competency recommendations could be generated. If the issue persists, contact the administrators.

importAll.title: Import all Competencies from another course
importAll.success: Imported {{ noOfCompetencies }} competencies from course "{{ courseTitle }}".
importAll.warning: No competencies were found for course "{{ courseTitle }}".

create.title: Create a new competency
create.titleRequiredValidationError: A competency needs to have a title
create.titleMaxLengthValidationError: A competency title is limited to {{max}} characters
create.descriptionMaxLengthValidationError: A competency description is limited to {{max}} characters
create.softDueDateHint: Guide students by selecting when you expect them to have mastered this competency. This is not a hard deadline.
create.connectWithLectureUnits: Link the competency with lecture units

link.title: Linked Competencies
link.lectureUnit: Optionally link this lecture unit to one or more competencies.
link.exercise: Optionally link this exercise to one or more competencies.

competencyCard.connectedLectureUnitsExplanation: The following lecture units are linked to this competency:
competencyCard.ringsTooltip: Your route to competency mastery. (Red = Mastery, Green = Progress)
competencyCard.ringsTooltipHideProgress: You have not yet rated your mastery of this competency, please rate it to see your progress.
competencyCard.exerciseNote: Please note that we take always the last submission into account for exercise units. Even submissions after the due date. This means for example that you can improve your progress by re-trying a quiz as often as you like. It is therefore normal, that the score here might differ from the score you officially achieved in an exercise.

delete.question: Do you really want to delete the competency {{ title }}? You can not undo this action!
delete.typeNameToConfirm: Please enter the name of the competency for confirmation.

competencyCard.progressUnavailable: Progress calculation is currently only available for competencies linked to lecture units.
competencyCard.noUnitsConnected: This competency is not linked to any lecture units
competencyCard.progressExplanation: Progress: You achieved currently {{ progress }}% of {{ points }} points
competencyCard.progressCourseExplanation: Average Course Progress: The course achieved currently on average {{ progress }}% of {{ points }} points

competencyPopover.explanation: This lecture unit helps you to achieve the following competencies:
competencyPopover.noCompetencies: No competencies are linked with this lecture unit!

relation.createsCircularRelation: You can not create circular relations between competencies.
relation.selfRelation: You can not create a relation between a competency and itself.

typeExplanation.ASSUMES: The head competency assumes that the student mastered the tail competency and teaches new knowledge that builds upon the tail competency.
typeExplanation.EXTENDS: The head competency assumes that the student mastered the tail competency and deepens that knowledge further.
typeExplanation.MATCHES: The head and tail competency match and cover the same knowledge.

importSettings.importRelationsTooltip: Imports all relations between the course competencies
importSettings.importExercisesTooltip: Imports all exercises of the course competencies or links them to the imported course competency if an exercise with that name already exists
importSettings.importLecturesTooltip: Imports all related lecture units of the course competencies or links them to the imported course competency if a lecture unit with that name already exists
importSettings.referenceDateTooltip: The reference date is used to calculate the dates of the imported resources. The earliest date of this type is set to the reference date and all other dates are set relative to this date.
importSettings.referenceDateTypeTooltip: 'Release date' refers to the release date of exercises and lecture units as well as the visible date of lectures. 'Due date' refers to the due date of exercises and competencies as well as the end date of lectures.

importAll.title: Import all Competencies and Prerequisites from another course
importAll.success: Imported {{ noOfCompetencies }} competencies and prerequisites from course "{{ courseTitle }}".
importAll.warning: No competencies or prerequisites were found for course "{{ courseTitle }}".

create.titleUniqueValidationError: There already exists a competency/prerequisite with this title in the course

keywords.REMEMBER: define, duplicate, list, note, repeat, recognize, reproduce, name
keywords.UNDERSTAND: classify, describe, discuss, explain, identify, locate, recognize, report, restate, select, translate
keywords.APPLY: execute, implement, solve, use, demonstrate, illustrate, operate, schedule, show, sketch
keywords.ANALYZE: differentiate, examine, experiment, question, relate, test, break down, contrast, distinguish
keywords.EVALUATE: appraise, argue, choose, defend, judge, select, support, value, critique
keywords.CREATE: design, formulate, hypothesize, invent, plan, propose, write, assemble, construct, develop

prerequisite.title: Prerequisites
prerequisite.optionalDescription: Optional prerequisites are not required to complete the learning path. They can provide additional practice or may cover material that exceeds the courses requirements.

manage.title: Prerequisite Management

delete.question: Do you really want to delete the prerequisite {{ title }}? You can not undo this action!
delete.typeNameToConfirm: Please enter the name of the prerequisite for confirmation.

manage.importAllButton: Import all prerequisites of a course
manage.empty: No prerequisites exist for this course

import.title: Import Prerequisites
import.selectedTableEmpty: No competencies selected to import as prerequisites

create.title: Create a new prerequisite
create.titleRequiredValidationError: A prerequisite needs to have a title
create.titleMaxLengthValidationError: A prerequisite title is limited to {{max}} characters
create.descriptionMaxLengthValidationError: A prerequisite description is limited to {{max}} characters
create.softDueDateHint: Guide students by selecting when you expect them to have mastered this prerequisite. This is not a hard deadline.
create.connectWithLectureUnits: Link the prerequisite with lecture units

importAll.title: Import all Prerequisites from another course
importAll.success: Imported {{ noOfCompetencies }} prerequisites from course "{{ courseTitle }}".
importAll.warning: No prerequisites were found for course "{{ courseTitle }}".

delete.question: Do you really want to delete the prerequisite {{ title }}? You can not undo this action!
delete.typeNameToConfirm: Please enter the name of the prerequisite for confirmation.

manageLearningPaths.title: Learning Path Management

missing.title: Missing Learning Paths
missing.body: Some students have not generated their learning paths yet. This is not critical. Their learning paths will be created once they request their learning path for the first time.

noCompetencies.title: No Competencies
noCompetencies.body: You have not created competencies yet. Learning paths are composed of the competencies students have to fulfill. Go to the competency management tab to create new competencies or import existing ones.

noRelations.title: No Relations
noRelations.body: You have not configured relations between competencies. Learning paths use this information about the structure of the learning materials to reliably provide high quality recommendations to students. Go to the competency management tab to configure competency relations.

manageLearningPaths.isDisabled: Learning Paths are currently disabled for this course.
manageLearningPaths.enableHint: The creation of learning paths for every student may take a moment.

participate.noTaskSelected: Currently you have no lecture unit or exercise selected.

competencyEnd.title: Competency end
competencyEnd.tooltip: This is the end of a competency. The nodes between the competency start and end help you to master this competency.

matchStart.title: Branch
matchStart.tooltip: It's up to you with which competency you're going to continue. The competencies have been defined as equivalent by your instructor, i.e. mastering one of the competencies is sufficient.

matchEnd.title: Convergence
matchEnd.tooltip: Here the different competencies join again. The competencies have been defined as equivalent by your instructor, i.e. mastering one of the competencies is sufficient.

learningObject.title: Pending lecture unit / exercise
learningObject.tooltip: A lecture unit or exercise that has not been sufficiently solved.

completedLearningObject.title: Completed lecture unit / exercise
completedLearningObject.tooltip: A lecture unit or exercise that has been sufficiently solved.
